reviewText: A quick overview of Wolters' method, with improvements. Definitely suggest the Huntsmith DVD's, the Joan Bailey books, and the Smith/Tarrant book over any of Wolters' though.
Very good information. A little on the dry side, but its not easy to add spice to a training video. Very good training tips.
Follow this video to the T and you will not be disappointed.  Stick with the program and your dog will be as good a hunting dog as anyone can expect to be lucky enough to have.
